title: UI Designer - FUll Stack Developer - Technical Writer - Blogger
name: Kalana Weerarathna
summary: I am a moonlighting professional with a passion for creating interfaces that are not only enjoyable and practical but also user-centric. My skills span both front-end and back-end development, allowing me to bring these interfaces to life with seamless functionality. With a strong focus on user experience, I strive to build web applications that are engaging, efficient, and user-friendly.
